borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1 - REAR Garden - Norway Maple (Acer platanoides) Sever Ivy and reduce to previous reduction points.T2 - REAR Garden - Sycamore (Acer pseudoplatanus) Repollard.T3 - REAR Garden - Norway Maple (Acer platanoides)suckers below Plane Fell as unsuitable for location.T4 - REAR Garden - London plane (Platanus × acerifolia) Repollard.T5 - REAR Garden - Sycamore (Acer pseudoplatanus) Repollard.T6 - REAR Garden - Black Poplar (Populus nigra) Repollard.T7 - REAR Garden -Black Poplar (Populus nigra) Repollard.T8-T11 - REAR Garden - Black Poplar Repollard and remove ivy and inspect.T12 - REAR Garden - Leyland cypress (× Cuprocyparis leylandii) Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by up to 2m. Final height 14m and spread 9m.T13 - REAR Garden -Eucalyptus - Cider Gum (Eucalyptus gunnii) Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by up to 2m. Final height 9 m and spread 6m.
